The Onyx Lantern.name: The Onyx Lantern
The Onyx Lantern.bonus: Onyx Statues now give 2.30x their bonus, instead of just 2.0x!
The Onyx Lantern.ancientBonus: The artifact's main bonus is doubled!
The Onyx Lantern.eldritchBonus: The artifact's main bonus is tripled!
The Onyx Lantern.sovereignBonus: The artifact's main bonus is quadrupled!

The Winz Lantern.name: The Winz Lantern
The Winz Lantern.bonus: All Winner Bonuses from Summoning are 1.25x Bigger!
The Winz Lantern.ancientBonus: The artifact's main bonus is doubled!
The Winz Lantern.eldritchBonus: The artifact's main bonus is tripled!
The Winz Lantern.sovereignBonus: The artifact's main bonus is quadrupled!

The Shim Lantern.name: The Shim Lantern
The Shim Lantern.bonus: Shimmer bonuses from World 2 Islands give 2x their bonus! Further boosts to this are 3x, 4x, etc
The Shim Lantern.ancientBonus: The artifact's main bonus is doubled!
The Shim Lantern.eldritchBonus: The artifact's main bonus is tripled!
The Shim Lantern.sovereignBonus: The artifact's main bonus is quadrupled!
